hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Compass# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #0# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Third Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Ice Cavern#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Saria's Song# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #Zelda's Lullaby#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Side Room Near Dodongos

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Map of Dodongo's Cavern# can be found in #Goron City#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #the Serenade of Water#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Bunny Hood#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #4# major items.
